channel.title: Criss Angel (Mindfreak)
channel.description:
Criss Angel, AKA, Mindfreak, came to my town, Lake Havasu City, AZ today and did a season finale stunt where he was cemented and locked and was dunked under water (off the London Bridge) and had to pick 22 locks.
My step dad was the crane man on the job and I got to meet him and shit. I also know the secrets to how he did it :O. They are so simple you would have a hard time figuring it out haha.
But yeah just wanted to share :) It goes on A&E sometime in August. You'll see me in there a few times. I wore a blue hat so I would stand out and could find myself easier in shots haha
EDIT - Yeah I know, cool story bro.

item.title: Criss Angel (Mindfreak)
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“jmood128, post:20, topic:339486”]I do give magicians credit though, it is hard to learn how to be a good illusionist.[/quote]Hell yeah dude. I remember being a kid and having a beginners set and couldn’t do any of em, so I just used them as weapons against my sister. The only tricks I can do is make a card or dollar float and a few card tricks

Read full topic

item.title: Criss Angel (Mindfreak)
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

He is an illusionist, they play tricks with you eye to make it look like something magical. I should say they are like ninjas, since the ninja was highly trained in illusions.

Read full topic

item.title: Criss Angel (Mindfreak)
item.dc:creator: @runefreak10 runefreak10
item.description:
@runefreak10 wrote:

[quote=“TabbyKiller, post:12, topic:339486”][quote author=runefreak10 link=topic=435871.msg3201551#msg3201551 date=1273372460]
Well I’m not saying I don’t like the guy. All the stuff he does is cool. It’s just a disappointment it’s not real. But how can it be, eh?

David Blaine Street Magic is something I want to figure out though. Like how he does it.
[/quote]
sorry to burst your bubble but david blaine is fake[/quote]

You didn’t. I know. That’s why I said I want to know how he does it. Like his secrets.

Read full topic

item.title: Criss Angel (Mindfreak)
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

[quote=“runefreak10, post:4, topic:339486”][quote author=ChaosPkers link=topic=435871.msg3201476#msg3201476 date=1273367830]

What are his secrets?
[/quote]he got a few law runes and nature runes and magically got out im not allowed to tell hahaha im on a confidential contract cuz i was with my step dad

But all of his stuff is fake bullshit, right?[/quote]yea hahaha ill just say that

  1. the cement is… “not whole”
  2. the locks and the pick arent that hard to pick
  3. his lungs arent as big as you think
  4. editing videos can do wonders hahaha

Read full topic
